attributes.action: Abolish the time limit for renewing motor insurance before loosing your No Claims Bonus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have recently started using public to travel to and from work and have therefore sold my car. 

I have 5+ years no claims discount and will lose my no claims after a period of 2 years if i do not insure another vehicle. (5 years NCB = 60% + discount). I do not want to loose my NCB. Therefore i will have to purchase another car shortly.

What is the point of encouraging people to give up there car and use public transport.

If i need to purchase a car in the future for some reason i will be penalised in this way.

Not government legislation but i am sure the government could do something to pursuade the insurance companies. 

Or compensate people who have given up there car with a one off payment or tax incentive, or best of all a free bus pass for a year.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
